data.title: James Maby: Where Is The Ex-husband Of Stacey Dash Now?
data.meta_description: James Maby is the ex-husband of American actress Stacey Dash. James ex-wife Stacey has appeared in several notable films. data.text:
James Maby is the ex-husband of American actress Stacey Dash. Jamesâ ex-wife Stacey has appeared in several notable films. She got her big break when she was cast as Dionne in the hit comedy Clueless (1995). She went on to star in a television spin-off of the same name, in which she reprised her role as Dionne. The series ran from 1996 to 1999.

James Maby: Bio Summary

Who Is Stacey Dashâs Ex-husband, James Maby?

James Maby was born in London, United Kingdom but his date of birth is unknown. He hasnât revealed much about his family and formative years. He reportedly claims to speak five languages. He studied at Eton College and The University of Edinburgh. He is a British businessman. He is the CEO of Sports Logistics Ltd, an international sports branding firm.

James Maby has been the CEO of the firm for over a decade. He does design, produces, and manages the logistics for Sports Worldwide. His company specializes in signage for big sporting events like; IRB Rugby World Cups, ICC Cricket World Cups, FIFA World Cups, IAAF World Championships, OCA Asian Games, and numerous smaller Events.

James Maby served as the producer of Cricket Fever: Mumbai Indians. He was also a reality star himself, having starred in and won the British competition reality show Lost however, he is not credited on his IMDb page of the show. James was previously married to Stacey Dash.

Also Read: Emmanuel Xuereb: Everything About Stacey Dashâs Ex-husband

James Maby and the Clueless actress Stacey Dash walked down the aisle on February 26, 2005. Unfortunately, their marriage didnât last long enough. They got divorced in 2006 after about a year of being together. Stacey has two children, Austin Williams, and Lola Lovell. Staceyâs daughter Lola is said to be the child of either James Maby or Staceyâs first husband Brian Lovell.

James Maby is not the only man Stacey Dash has been married to. She has been married to producer Brian Lovell, actor Emmanuel Xuereb, and lawyer Jeffrey Marty. Stacey and her fourth husband Jeffrey got married in Florida on April 6, 2018, just 10 days after they met. She announced their separation and filed for divorce but it is unknown if their divorce has been finalized or not.

James Maby also got married to interior designer Landon Clements. They met in Colorado when Landon was just 24 years old. They got married on October 24, 2008, but divorced in 2012. Landon claimed she went through a phase of loneliness during her marriage to James and âwalk away from all of itâ.

Landon decided to leave James Maby and California behind. She said, âI was living the dream. We had a house in the [Hollywood] Hills, swimming pool, staff, the cars, the jewels. When I moved out of the house I pretty much just walked away from all of itâ¦. âOn the inside I was so alone, so I packed up and left. Sometimes you just have to save yourself. â

At the time of her divorce, Landon said, âItâs time to deal with the legal aspect of what it really means to get divorced and start your life over. No one in my family has been divorced â¦ It was just this, like, Southern pride. You made this decision to marry him and now you have to toughen off and figure out how to stick with your decision. â¦ It was really hard to tell my mom I was getting divorced.â

Also Read: Jeffrey Marty: Facts About Stacey Dashâs Husband

Where Is James Maby Now?

James Maby is living in Los Angeles, California USA. According to a source, he is in a romantic relationship with Kam Heskin, an actress, and publicist for jewels companies. They are said to have dated for 6months and married on September 2018. James reportedly uploaded a picture in front of the wedding chapel and disclosed âabout their marital connection.â
